::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus: Hydras, are you thinking about using a haloimage puppet like Megatron.. err, you once used in the likeness of Optimus Prime? You tried to have the puppet lead the Earth bound Autobots into some distructive crystals, correct? I enjoy history.

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
Hydras:
  
 "What if we got some help of... Her old  bodyguard???" said enigmatly Hydras and later of that he typed some buttons in  his com link and said "Perceptor... I want a special project from you...  Something like I did once with Optimus Prime, this is the bot... Work quickly...  we're running our plan"
  
 "Yes master Hydras" said trought the com link  Perceptor
  
 "Our objetive is lead Rodimus here and his wife to  Blackfortress once she's captured"said the male"and in that way that noone  notice it or knows who did it" said the Male
  
  
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   From:    Super    Cyclonus 
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   Sent: Wednesday, October 10, 2007 3:39    PM
   Subject: Re: Rising from the depths
   

      
> Hydras:
> 
> "I sent an agent but he doesnt reported    anything... Admit
> suggestions"

> ::Lord Jhiaxus::
>    
> Jhiaxus: Rodimus is there. There looks to be some kind of    disturbance
> in the city.

Myrmidon turns to look at Hydras and    Jhiaxus, "I would suggest then
taking a look for ourselves. If that agent    of yours has not reported
anything, then perhaps he is at the center of    these activities or has
been compromised. In either case this may be the    time to begin putting
this plan in motion."

Myrmidon paused    thoughtfully and then continued, "Where is this
Perceptor? Perhaps this one    can succeed in bringing down the defences
so we can breech them    clandestinely and we can take your pray, namely
Rodimus�    wife."

Myrmidon smiled a predatory smile as his fist clenched at his    side.
"Even if they know we have taken her, it won't matter, because    Rodimus
can be sent running after the clone. No doubt others will go with    him
on this chase, leaving the base even less defended then it is    now.�

Preston
(Myrmidon)
